articles.author: Jacob Wendler
articles.title: Trump brushes off European push on recognizing Palestinian statehood - Politico
articles.description: France said it would recognize Palestinian statehood, and the U.K. threatened to do so unless Israel changed course.
articles.content:
We never did discuss it. We have no view on that, Trump said of Starmers announcement on Air Force One on Tuesday. We are going to get a lot of money to the area so they get some food.
